SAP Cloud SDK - Parent POM 5.5.0 API

The SAP Cloud SDK for Java comprises a toolkit to develop cloud native applications on the SAP Business Technology Platform. In particular it makes it easy to connect to S4/HANA systems both in the cloud and on-premise but it also offers abstractions for the SAP Business Technology Platform.

Key Features:

  • Abstractions for SAP Business Technology Platform features
  • Code generators for OpenAPI and OData services.
  • Connectivity to S4/HANA (both cloud and on-premise) and other systems
  • Tenant and principal (user) awareness
  • Resilient execution of requests
The API is structured as follows:
  • cloudplatform contains platform specific features such as access to services, connectivity and resilience
  • Other packages containing utility classes and framework adaptations
